weapon_description: A polearm that appears to have been crafted from a metal agricultural tool. At first glance, it could not look more ordinary, yet its discreet design hides fittings that are both lavish and undeniably exquisite.
weapon_skill_description: Electro-Charged DMG is increased by 96%, and Lunar-Charged DMG is increased by 24%. Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam: Lunar-Charged DMG is increased by an additional 24%.
